content:
To normalize the provided profile data according to the specified guidelines, I will process each field that requires normalization. Let's go through the input profile and apply the necessary transformations:

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Sr. Software Eng",
  "location": "SF, CA",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React.js",
    "Node.js",
    "Proj. Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions inc.",
      "title": "Lead Software Eng",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Software Eng",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "SF Bay Area"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React",
    "Node.js",
    "Project Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      "title": "Lead Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Standardized SF to full city name; Expanded engineering abbreviations; Standardized company name punctuation"
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
1. **Title Normalization**: 
   - "Sr. Software Eng" was expanded to "Senior Software Engineer".
   
2. **Location Normalization**:
   - "SF, CA" was expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".
   - "SF Bay Area" was also expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".

3. **Key Skills Normalization**:
   - "React.js" was standardized to "React".
   - "Proj. Management" was expanded to "Project Management".

4. **Experience Normalization**:
   - Company name "Tech Solutions inc." was standardized to "Tech Solutions Inc.".
   - Job titles were expanded similarly to the main title.
   - Dates were converted to ISO format (e.g., "March 2018" to "2018-03").

5. **Normalization Notes**:
   - Added notes to indicate key changes made during normalization for transparency.

This normalized profile maintains the semantic meaning of the original data while adhering to the specified guidelines.
